definition: abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
to prepare/get ready/to provide or equip

sentences.english: Park visitors in Beijing will be frisked at 10 parks to avoid possible safety risk.
sentences.chinese: 北京10大公園將於近日起進行入園安檢，以備不測。

sentences.english: In the long run, one should save money for emergencies.
sentences.chinese: 從長遠看，應該存錢以備不測。
